code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTask=_ref=>{let{onTaskAdded}=_ref;const[task,setTask]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();console.log('Task to be added:',task);axios.post('/tasks',{task}).then(response=>{onTaskAdded(response.data);setTask('');}).catch(error=>console.error('Error adding task:',error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:task,onChange:e=>setTask(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter new task",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Task"})]});};export default AddTask;
